items.todoItem: Know that we were chosen by God for relationship with Him.
Know that we are sanctified by the Holy Spirit that is in you.
Know that Jesus Christ is the Son of God.
Know that God is abundantly merciful.
Know that the resurrection of Jesus from the dead gives us a living hope.
Know that we have a wonderful inheritance reserved for us in heaven.
Know that we are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation.
Rejoice in your hope despite the many and varied temptations you face.
Know that our faith will be tested with fire.
Rejoice with unspeakable joy because you believe in Jesus.
Be holy in all manner of conduct and conversation.
